name: Roblox Modern UI [READ DESCRIPTION]
description: We are moving to userstyles.world and to avoid using older versions of this style please get it on userstyles.world to ensure you get the latest version This extension requires you to enable dark mode in Roblox setttings! This style was made with and might be dependent (it was used in development) on RoGold and BTRoblox, please install these extensions to ensure you see this style correctly This style improves overall Roblox user experience and adds animated elements to make the site feel a bit more apppealing, it also adds brand new tab system and more rounded corners to ensure you will still have the modern feeling while using Roblox. If you have any issues make sure to join our discord here: https://nicolastech.xyz/discord
additional_info:
1.4 - THE BIGGEST CHANGE! Brand new button effect on click (inspired by bootstrap css) and now using box shadows for certain elements instead of borders (to allow animating them)

1.3 - Selection tabs (those for example in settings) now have been changed to use the border select styling.

1.2 - Tab navs have been fully redesigned

1.1 - Fixed no unhover animation on navbar on the side, added more animated buttons and improved tab navs so that they will have better background and new animation on hover.
